target.description: Target point whose orbit elements are required in origin, axes reference

stateType.description: Name of the state type to be computed, any of the state types available in godot::astro::StateType ( in Python, type help(godot.core.astro.StateType) for details )

propertyData.description: State conversion properties (e.g. gm): a string to scalar time evaluable map

settings.description: State conversion settings (e.g. L1-L3 for Liss): a string to string map
